33 namespace TiledArray {
34 
36 
47 class Pmap {
48  public:
49  typedef std::size_t size_type;
50 
51  protected:
52  const size_type rank_;
53  const size_type procs_;
54  const size_type size_;
55  std::vector<size_type> local_;
56  size_type local_size_;
57 
60  private:
61  Pmap(const Pmap&) = delete;
62  Pmap& operator=(const Pmap&) = delete;
63 
64  public:
66 
69  Pmap(World& world, const size_type size)
70  : rank_(world.rank()),
71  procs_(world.size()),
72  size_(size),
73  local_(),
74  local_size_(0) {}
75 
76  virtual ~Pmap() {}
77 
79 
82  virtual size_type owner(const size_type tile) const = 0;
83 
85 
88  virtual bool is_local(const size_type tile) const = 0;
89 
91 
93  size_type size() const { return size_; }
94 
96 
98  size_type rank() const { return rank_; }
99 
101 
103  size_type procs() const { return procs_; }
104 
106 
109  virtual bool known_local_size() const { return true; }
110 
112 
115  size_type local_size() const {
116  if (size_ > 0) TA_ASSERT(known_local_size() == true);
117  return local_size_;
118  }
119 
121 
124  bool empty() const {
125  if (size_ > 0) TA_ASSERT(known_local_size() == true);
126  return local_size_ == 0;
127  }
128 
130 
132  virtual bool is_replicated() const { return false; }
133 
136 
137  private:
138  virtual void advance(size_type& value, bool increment) const {
139  if (increment)
140  ++value;
141  else
142  --value;
143  }
144 
145  public:
150  class Iterator
151  : public boost::iterator_facade<Iterator, const size_type,
152  boost::bidirectional_traversal_tag> {
153  public:
162  Iterator(const Pmap& pmap, size_type begin_idx, size_type end_idx,
163  size_type idx, bool checking, bool use_pmap_advance = false)
164  : pmap_(&pmap),
165  use_it_(false),
166  idx_(idx),
167  begin_idx_(begin_idx),
168  end_idx_(end_idx),
169  checking_(checking),
170  use_pmap_advance_(use_pmap_advance) {
171  if (idx_ != end_idx) { // unless this is end
172  if (checking_ &&
173  idx_ == begin_idx_) { // create valid begin iterator if needed
174  while (idx_ < end_idx_ && !pmap_->is_local(idx_)) {
175  ++idx_;
176  }
177  } else // else assert that this is a valid iterator
178  TA_ASSERT(pmap_->is_local(idx_));
179  }
180  }
184  Iterator(const Pmap& pmap, std::vector<size_type>::const_iterator it)
185  : use_it_(true), it_(it) {
186  TA_ASSERT(it_ == pmap.local_.end() || pmap.is_local(*it_));
187  }
188 
189  private:
190  friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
191  const Pmap* pmap_ = nullptr;
192 
193  bool use_it_;
194 
195  // have iterator
196  std::vector<size_type>::const_iterator it_;
197 
199  size_type idx_ = 0;
200  size_type begin_idx_ = 0;
201  size_type end_idx_ = 0;
202  bool checking_ = true;
203  bool use_pmap_advance_ = false;
204 
207  void increment() {
208  if (use_it_) {
209  TA_ASSERT(it_ != pmap_->local_.end());
210  ++it_;
211  } else {
212  if (idx_ == end_idx_) return;
213  if (!use_pmap_advance_) {
214  ++idx_;
215  if (checking_) {
216  while (idx_ < end_idx_ && !pmap_->is_local(idx_)) {
217  ++idx_;
218  }
219  }
220  } else {
221  pmap_->advance(idx_, true);
222  }
223  if (idx_ > end_idx_) // normalize if past end
224  idx_ = end_idx_;
225  TA_ASSERT(idx_ == end_idx_ || pmap_->is_local(idx_));
226  }
227  }
231  void decrement() {
232  if (use_it_) {
233  TA_ASSERT(it_ !=
234  pmap_->local_
235  .begin()); // no good will happen if we decrement begin
236  TA_ASSERT(it_ != pmap_->local_.end()); // don't decrement the end since
237  // it's an invalid iterator
238  --it_;
239  } else {
240  TA_ASSERT(idx_ != begin_idx_);
241  TA_ASSERT(idx_ != end_idx_);
242  if (!use_pmap_advance_) {
243  --idx_;
244  if (checking_) {
245  while (idx_ > begin_idx_ && !pmap_->is_local(idx_)) {
246  --idx_;
247  }
248  }
249  } else {
250  pmap_->advance(idx_, false);
251  }
252  if (idx_ < begin_idx_) // normalize if past begin
253  idx_ = begin_idx_;
254  TA_ASSERT(idx_ == begin_idx_ || pmap_->is_local(idx_));
255  }
256  }
257 
262  bool equal(Iterator const& other) const {
263  TA_ASSERT(this->pmap_ == other.pmap_ && this->use_it_ == other.use_it_);
264  return use_it_ ? this->it_ == other.it_ : this->idx_ == other.idx_;
265  }
266 
269  const size_type& dereference() const { return use_it_ ? *it_ : idx_; }
270  };
271  friend class Iterator;
272 
273  typedef Iterator const_iterator;
274 
276 
278  virtual const_iterator begin() const {
279  return !local_.empty() ? Iterator(*this, local_.begin())
280  : Iterator(*this, 0, size_, 0, true);
281  }
282 
284 
286  virtual const_iterator end() const {
287  return !local_.empty() ? Iterator(*this, local_.end())
288  : Iterator(*this, 0, size_, size_, true);
289  }
290 
292 
294  const const_iterator cbegin() const { return begin(); }
295 
297 
299  const const_iterator cend() const { return end(); }
300 
302 
303 }; // class Pmap
304 
305 } // namespace TiledArray
